TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BamlLocalizabilityResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 解析二进制 XAML (BAML) 中类和属性的可本地化设置。

span.span: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in binary XAML (BAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 用于在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]中解析类和属性的可本地化性设置。 is used by the in order to resolve localizability settings for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]. 在资源提取时，以及在更新本地化的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 时，都会调用解析程序。The resolver is called both at the time of resource extraction as well as when localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated. 资源提取（）时，冲突解决程序：At the time of resource extraction (), the resolver: - 为 构造可本地化资源时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 中的类和属性提供 。Provides for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] when the is constructing localizable resources. - 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 中的元素提供格式首选项，以便将元素设置为内联标记的格式。Provides formatting preferences for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] so elements are formatted as inline tags. 在更新本地化的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] （）时，冲突解决程序：At the time at which localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated (), the resolver: - 将格式设置标记解析回类中。Resolves formatting tags back into classes. - 解析包含类定义的程序集的名称。Resolves the name of the assembly that contains class definition. - 是一个内部类的子类，用于执行 类函数的实用方面。 is subclassed by an internal class that performs the practical aspects of the class functions for .

MemberSignature.Value: protected BamlLocalizabilityResolver ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: BamlLocalizabilityResolver();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability (string assembly, string className);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability(string assembly, string className) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetElementLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String) As ElementLocalizability
public: abstract System::Windows::Markup::Localizer::ElementLocalizability ^ GetElementLocalizability(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ className);
abstract member GetElementLocalizability : string * string -> System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability

param.name: assembly
param.span: 包含要本地化的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 程序集的全名。

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.

param.name: className
param.span: 要检索其本地化信息的元素的完整类名。

span.span: The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示指定类型的元素是否可本地化以及在可本地化时是否可设置为内联格式。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified type of element can be localized and, if so, whether it can be formatted inline.

returns.span: 一个包含指定程序集和元素的本地化信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the localizability information for the specified assembly and element.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute GetPropertyLocalizability (string assembly, string className, string property);

Public MustOverride Function GetPropertyLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String, property As String) As LocalizabilityAttribute

abstract member GetPropertyLocalizability : string * string * string -> System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute

param.name: assembly
param.span: 包含要本地化的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 程序集的全名。

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.

param.name: className
param.span: 要检索其本地化信息的元素的完整类名。

span.span: The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

param.name: property
param.span: 要检索其本地化信息的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示指定类型的元素的指定属性是否可本地化。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified property of a specified type of element can be localized.

returns.span: 一个指定属性是否可本地化以及如何本地化的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies whether and how the property can be localized.

public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveAssemblyFromClass(System::String ^ className);
abstract member ResolveAssemblyFromClass : string -> string

summary.span: 返回包含指定类的程序集的全名。

span.span: Returns the full name of the assembly that contains the specified class.

returns.span: 包含类的程序集的全名。

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ResolveFormattingTagToClass (string formattingTag);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ResolveFormattingTagToClass(string formattingTag) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ResolveFormattingTagToClass (formattingTag As String) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveFormattingTagToClass(System::String ^ formattingTag);
abstract member ResolveFormattingTagToClass : string -> string

summary.span: 返回 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中尚未遇到过的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 标记的完整类名。

span.span: Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].

returns.span: 与该标记关联的完整类名。

span.span: The full class name associated with the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 或等效项正在将替换应用到可本地化的资源时调用此方法。This method is called when a or an equivalent is applying substitutions to localizable resources. 如果在替换中遇到格式设置标记，则调用此方法以将格式设置标记解析回类名称。If a formatting tag is encountered in the substitutions, this method is called to resolve the formatting tag back to a class name.
